name: Gorehounds of Doom
summary: Gorehounds of Doom is an 18 level megawad for doom 2 in mbf21 format started by Thelokk. The theme of the project was simple and unrestrictive, with each mapper creating something under their personal interpretation of horror in a doom wad. The result is a wide variety of maps ranging from atmospheric environmental storytelling to slaughter under a dark/gory aesthetic.
